Module lanat
Package lanat.helpRepresentation

Class ArgumentRepr

java.lang.Object
lanat.helpRepresentation.ArgumentRepr
public final class ArgumentRepr extends Object
Contains methods for generating the help representations of Arguments.

  • Method Details

    • getRepresentation

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String getRepresentation(@NotNull @NotNull Argument<?,?> arg, boolean multipleNames)
      Returns the representation of the given argument like shown below:

      <prefix><names> <type_representation>

      or

      <type_representation> (<names>): if the argument is positional

      Parameters:
      arg - the argument
      multipleNames - if true, multiple names will be shown. If false, only the longest name will be shown
      Returns:
      the representation of the argument

    • getDescription

      @Nullable public static @Nullable String getDescription(@NotNull @NotNull Argument<?,?> arg, boolean forceName)
      Returns the getRepresentation(Argument, boolean) and description of the given argument like shown below: 
       <representation>:
   <description>
      Parameters:
      arg - the argument
      Returns:
      the representation and description of the argument
